dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S1013 IS: Consolidating Aerospace Programs Efficiently at Canaveral Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Moody (for herself and Mr. Scott of Florida) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

form.official-title: To require the headquarters of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to be transferred to Brevard County, Florida.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Consolidating Aerospace Programs Efficiently at Canaveral Act or CAPE Canaveral Act.

section.header: Transfer of National Aeronautics and Space Administration headquarters to Brevard County, Florida
section.text: Not later than 1 year after the date of the enactment of this Act, the headquarters of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration shall be transferred to Brevard County, Florida.
